br.com.caelum.vraptor.observer

Class RequestHandlerObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.observer.RequestHandlerObserver

  • @ApplicationScoped
public class RequestHandlerObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    Looks up the ControllerMethod for a specific request and start InterceptorStack if it was found, otherwise delegates for the 404 component.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira, Cecilia Fernandes, Rodrigo Turini
